thread.section_title: StorageMart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StorageMart | storage-mart.com
thread.title: Kay Thompson

author: Kay Thompson
title: Kay Thompson
text: I have used StorageMart for over 8 years. I went from the smallest unit for myself to a medium unit that I share with my business partner. We went to 2 units when we needed more space to expand our business. I put my name on a waiting list for a bigger space so we could combine our 2 units. The manager contacted when my request became available. They have always worked with us and have been so friendly.
